About Flo

A lightweight workflow definition library

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
Flo API Generator Internal module containing an annotation processor for generating the TaskBuilder API
Flo Workflow Definition Core workflow definition API
Flo Scala API Scala API Bindings for Flo
Flo Runner Top level runner implementation
Flo Command Line Bindings Experimental module containing command line binding utilities
Flo Freezer Experimental module containing task persistence tools
Flo GCS Tasks Utility tasks for Google Cloud Storage
Test - Flo Integration Tests Internal module with integration tests
Test - Flo Task Runner Internal module containing used for testing
